title: CMD Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Technical Officer Posts
description: Centre for Management Development Kerala (CMD Kerala) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Technical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the CMD Kerala Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, Selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of a...
